metadata.title: USN-3336-1 -- NSS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that NSS incorrectly handled certain empty SSLv2 messages. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause NSS to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3336-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 libnss3-dev - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 libnss3 - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 libnss3-1d - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 libnss3-tools - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 No subscription required
